activities: RevPAR Collective owns and operates "STASH HOTEL REWARDS" a rewards program for independent hotels.  Program members earn "Stash Points" in connection with stays at participating hotels and may also redeem points for stays at participating hotels.  Program members may reside in the EU and participating hotels may be located in the EU.  The personal information of program members who reside in the EU is collected, stored, used, shared and protected as described in our privacy policy.  Information relating to program members who stay (or book stays) at participating hotels located in the EU is shared with such hotels as described in our privacy policy.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: on-line and offline data as described in our privacy policy
